# Who is Erfan?
Erfan was born and raised in Iran. He immigrated to the United States after finishing high school, where he continued his higher education. He has enjoyed living in California, Michigan, and New York, where he now calls home. 

\

# Research
Erfan is passionate about health outcomes research, particularly in the field of cardiovascular diseases. He is also interested in translational research on cardiac valve degeneration.
